section.description: User enters detailed search criteria and sees a list of Issues that match. Next, the user can drill into a specific Issue from the list.

stakeholders.actor: Wants to be able to search for an Issue with great detail (including all Attribute fields) and quickly find it.

results.result: A list of matching Issues are displayed or go directly to the Issue if only one matches.

item.q: If all Issues are in project context, is there a quick way to jump to Issue in another project?

faq.item: If possible a link to the other project should be provided.

item.q: How can this functionality be put on tigris StartPage?

faq.item: As a small text entry box.

notes.note: Need to consider the ability to save/restore searches. This functionality should go into a search editor usecase.

ol.li: User: Enter search criteria into field and hits 'search' button. There may be other buttons on the page to deal with AND/OR style searching similar to Bugzilla's functionality.
Scarab: filters search based on users role permissions.
